1.0.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-free-checkout
1.0.description:
Allows for Free Checkout with WordPress e-Commerce Plugin. Can be used with 100% discount coupons and $0.00 products. When the cart total is $0.00 the payment form will be replaced with the text 'Free Checkout' and offsite checkout will be skipped.

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/

Plugin Support: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/support/

Plugin Page: http://mywebsiteadvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/wp-e-commerce-free-checkout/

Premium Version with Advanced Features including:

  • Available To Members Only Option.
  • Available Only To Specified User Roles Option.
  • Hide Billing
